name: environment_fog_of_war
title: Fog of war
subtitle: Environment
description: Ignore formations. Only the strength
of the units is considered.

name: environment_river
title: River
subtitle: Environment
description: Both sides require and extra unit to
claim this battlefield.

name: environment_bridge
title: Bridge
subtitle: Environment
description: Both sides require one less unit to
claim this battlefield.

name: environment_oil_field
title: Oil field
subtitle: Environment
description: Counts double if claimed (but not as
adjacent).

name: environment_nuclear_detonation
title: Nuclear detonation
subtitle: Environment
description: All units in this battlefield are discarded.

name: environment_extraction
title: Extraction
subtitle: Environment
description: The winner of this battlefield must
return all their cards back to the
bottom of the corresponding pile and
take 7 new cards.

name: environment_intelligence
title: Intelligence
subtitle: Environment
description: The winner of this battlefield can look
at the top 3 cards in the tactic deck
(but cannot take one or change the order).

name: environment_retreat
title: Retreat
subtitle: Environment
description: The loser of this battlefield takes back
one of their units into their hand
(they must discard one before).

name: environment_fire_at_will
title: Fire at will
subtitle: Environment
description: All new deployments must be played here
until one player claims the battlefield.

name: environment_sandstorm
title: Sandstorm
subtitle: Environment
description: No one can deploy a unit here for the
next 5 turns.

name: environment_minefield
title: Minefield
subtitle: Environment
description: The next unit deployed here is discarded.

name: environment_heavy_machinery
title: Heavy machinery
subtitle: Environment
description: Units with strength 1 to 5 cannot be
deployed here.

name: environment_trenches
title: Trenches
subtitle: Environment
description: Units with strength 6 to 10 cannot be
deployed here.

name: environment_camouflage
title: Camouflage
subtitle: Environment
description: Next units are all stealth.

name: environment_sabotage
title: Sabotage
subtitle: Environment
description: No tactic cards can be played in
this battlefield.

name: environment_collateral_damage
title: Collateral damage
subtitle: Environment
description: When claiming this battlefield, discard
one of your units from another battlefield.

name: environment_ambush
title: Ambush
subtitle: Environment
description: When claiming this battlefield, discard
one of your opponent's units from an
adjacent battlefield.

name: environment_crossfire
title: Crossfire
subtitle: Environment
description: Units of the same strength annihilate
each other. If no units are present in the
battlefield, the tactic card is discarded.

name: environment_bunker
title: Bunker
subtitle: Environment
description: Units in this battlefield cannot be
moved or discarded.
